discourse_list.title: Who is best to contact for partnerships and integrations

content.content: Hi there, Im writing from stackit.finance. We have developed Stackit, a new decentralized and multichain DCA platform in partnership with Kyber Network and beefy. Stackit.finance features :  Multichain DCA into Multi assets Completely automated and effortless Idle assets generate yield in stables Fees sharing system across referrals No tokens, pure utility and services on chain. Best swap fees across every chain New UI/UX coming soon.  We are soon launching on over 10 chains and have Dai as one of our input currencies in which users will be able to earn yield on while they wait for their trades to execute. We’d love to find a way to work together to gain exposure and also feature MKR as a promoted coin to DCA into on our upcoming UI revamp. Please let me know who would be the best person to reach out to. Thanks!

Hi thanks for reaching out, while I am not familiar with details regarding the product, in terms of potential collaboration @MakerGrowth CU will be able to assist. You can also find them on Growth CU on Maker Discord MakerDAO Official Discord
This topic was automatically closed 30 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
